LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.EnableFarmingHysteresi: Start planting when the configured amount gets lower than the configured lower amount and stop when it gets above the configured upper amount.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.UseGlobalValuesDesc: For all zones of the same crop with this setting enabled, they will share the same bound values.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.DecrementLowerHysteres: Decrement the lower bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.IncrementLowerHysteres: Increment the lower bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.DecrementUpperHysteres: Decrement the upper bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.IncrementUpperHysteres: Increment the upper bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.LowerBound: Start planting {0} when there are fewer than {1} {2} in storage
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.UpperBound: Stop planting {0} when there are more than {1} {2} in storage
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.LatchModeDesc.BelowLow: Lower than the lower bound. Sowing enabled.
